TopicTitle: Game crashes when going back to VAB

Articles.Content:
Hi, i've had multiple crashes now when trying to revert back to VAB from KRASH simulation, or entering VAB from  the KSC.

I have mod KRASH which is simulation mod, it doesn't crash every time i quit simulation so im confused about what's really causing my game to crash.

My player.log and error.log and Modlist

First crash player.log 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/cctd5dlak7m86lb/Player.log?dl=0

 

Second crash player.log and error.log

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ai95mf4ip5ki62t/error.log?dl=0
